name: Shred Video
headline: Shred Video builds automated video & photo systems that allowâ¦
description:
Shred Video, a new startup launching out of Y Combinator, allows users to take footage from their iPhone, GoPro or drone and simply match it with a song from the userâs iTunes library. Thatâs all. Shred Video does the rest of the work.

Taking into account the acceleration of the camera itself, Shred Video can pin-point the moments of action for surfers, snowboarders, skaters and other acceleration-based sports to highlight all of the coolest clips in your footage. And beyond that, Shred Video matches those epic moments with the beat-drop of the song.

raw_markdown="[ Shred Video](https://shredvideo.com/<index.html>)
  * [Features](https://shredvideo.com/<#features>)
  * [Partners](https://shredvideo.com/<#partners>)
  * [About](https://shredvideo.com/<about.html>)
  * [FAQ](https://shredvideo.com/<faq.html>)

[Request A Demo](https://shredvideo.com/</demo.html>)
# Automated Videofor Adventure Tours
[Watch The Video](https://shredvideo.com/</skydive.html>)
## **Sell Videos to Your Customers**
Shred Video helps you create and sell cinematic, shareable videos to your customers effortlessly.
## **Shred Features**
#### Increase Revenue
**Drive more revenue** selling your customers cinema quality videos (and photos) of their tour or activity.
#### Deliver Instantly
Your customers get their videos and photos immediately at the conclusion of their activity with **zero wait time**.
#### Save Time & Money
Shred Video requires **no dedicated staff** to operate. If you already have a photographer or videographer on staff, even better — we’ll turn them into a photo & video superhero. Like Tony Stark with a camera.
#### Theatre + Touchscreen Display
We’ll set up theatre and touchscreen displays so your customers can watch their videos in **full cinematic glory** , as well as interact directly with their media on personal touchscreens.
#### Cloud Delivery
No more hassling with USB sticks for you or your customers. Shred Video delivers media via the cloud, so your customers can immediately **view and share right from their phones**.
#### Social Media Sharing
We deliver customer videos + photos via a web experience designed and branded just for you, **easily shareable on social media**.
#### Custom Integration
Our system is **customized to your operation** , so you get the best experience for your staff and customers.
#### Ongoing Support
Our support team will make sure you’re never left high and dry or without a paddle.
#### Continuous Improvement
We’re constantly pushing system **upgrades that you’ll get for free**.
## Try for Free
We’ll let you see Shred Video live before you pay us a dime. Take 10 seconds to **sign up for a free demo now**.
[Request A Demo](https://shredvideo.com/</demo.html>)
### **Shred Video’s automated video & photo systems work for any adventure tour or activity.**
We use LiDar, GPS, smart camera technology, and proprietary algorithms to automatically capture, edit, and share cinematic videos & photos to your customers. Think of it like the technology of self-driving cars applied to adventure activity videos, with the cinematic flair you’d expect from Red Bull Media House.
We currently serve skydiving, bungy jumping, giant swing, river rafting, paragliding, and many other tours and activities. **Check out our partner sites below** to see us in action with current clients, and [**sign up for a free demo now**](https://shredvideo.com/</demo.html>) to see Shred Video work for you.
## **Shred Partners**
Check out these solutions in operation at our partner sites. Each of the below movies are of actual customers, delivered within 55 seconds of their dive, jump, paddle, or flight.
### Skydive Utah
##### Tooele, Utah
Algorithms automatically produce 4 unique videos for each customer, delivered within seconds of landing and perfect for sharing on social media.
_“Every minute counts at our drop zone and Shred has been a huge time saver. It's super simple to use. Our customers are stoked on the 4 different edits including short cuts for social media. Shred has re-designed and modernized the typical tandem video which was a much needed upgrade for our business.”_
##### MIKE CHAPMAN, CO-OWNER

### AJ Hackett Cairns + Sentosa
##### Cairns, Australia & Sentosa, Singapore
Smart cameras + LiDar sensors track the customer through their bungy jump. Algorithms compose the videos within 1 minute of the customer touching ground.
_“Shred Video is bloody fantastic. We did ok recording and selling videos ourselves; since implementing Shred we make better videos than ever with fewer staff! Our sales have ballooned, social media activity has shot up, and staff is free to focus on customer service. I can’t imagine going back to the old ways.”_
##### LUKE JOHNSON, General Manager

generated_description:
### Shred Video: Revolutionizing Adventure Videography

Shred Video is a dynamic startup that automates the creation of high-quality video and photo experiences specifically tailored for adventure sports. Founded during the Y Combinator Summer 2015 batch (S15) and currently based in San Francisco, the company is on a mission to enhance the way thrill-seekers capture and share their experiences.

#### The Core Idea

Imagine you’ve just gone skydiving or bungee jumping, and rather than waiting for hours—or days—for your footage, you instantly receive a professionally edited video perfectly synced to your favorite track. That’s exactly what Shred Video offers. Users can upload footage from their iPhone, GoPro, or drone, select a song from their iTunes library, and let the technology do the rest. The platform utilizes advanced algorithms and smart camera technology to highlight moments of action, ensuring that every adrenaline-fueled thrill comes together in a cinematic display.

#### Key Features

1. **Instant Video Delivery**: No more waiting for your media. Shred Video delivers content immediately after the customer's experience—perfect for those who can't wait to share.
  
2. **Revenue Generation**: Partner organizations can sell high-quality videos and photos directly to customers, increasing income without additional staffing costs.

3. **Cloud-Based Sharing**: Forget about USB sticks and complicated downloads. Customers get instant access to their footage via the cloud, ready to share across social media platforms.

4. **Customization**: The system is tailored to fit into existing businesses, allowing for seamless integration and the potential to enhance current staff capabilities.

5. **Ongoing Support and Upgrades**: Shred Video continuously improves its systems and provides robust support to ensure partners are always in top shape.

#### Applications

Shred Video is already making waves in the adventure tourism space, serving companies in activities like skydiving, bungy jumping, white-water rafting, and more. Their partnership with organizations—such as Skydive Utah—highlights their ability to produce multiple unique video edits shortly after a jump, making the service not just convenient but also a massive customer delight.

#### Conclusion

In a world where experience is king, Shred Video is leading the charge to make those experiences immortal. By marrying cutting-edge technology with an understanding of adventure sports, Shred Video is not just filming; they're reshaping the way memories are captured and shared. If you’re keen on seeing it in action, you can check out their offerings and request a demo at [Shred Video's website](https://shredvideo.com). 

So, if you're ready to take your adventure tours to the next level, it might be time to get your Shred on!
